00003 #ifndef __SLIME_MODREF_H__
00004 #define __SLIME_MODREF_H__
00005 
00006 typedef struct modref_event_s modref_event_t;
00007 typedef modref_event_t read_t;
00008 typedef modref_event_t write_t;
00009 
00010 #include "ceal.h"
00011 #include "traceobj.h"
00012 #include "timestamp.h"
00013 #include "closure.h"
00014 
00015 ifun    modref_init(modref_t* modref);
00016 
00017 void*   modref_deref(modref_t* modref);
00018 read_t* modref_tmpread(modref_t* modref);
00019 read_t* modref_addread(read_t* tmpread, closure_t* closure);
00020 void    modref_remread(read_t* read);
00021 
00022 void    modref_write(modref_t* modref, void* val);
00023 void    modref_remwrite(write_t* write, timestamp_t* time);
00024 
00025 typedef enum modref_event_tag_e {
00026   MODREF_EVENT_READ,
00027   MODREF_EVENT_WRITE,
00028 } modref_event_tag_t;
00029 
00030 typedef enum modref_tag_e {
00031   MODREF_INITIALIZED = 1,
00032 } modref_tag_t;
00033    
00034 struct modref_event_s {
00035   void*          value; /* read/write value */
00036   modref_event_t* next; /* next event for modref */
00037   modref_event_t* prev; /* prev event for modref */
00038   union {
00039     modref_event_tag_t tag; /* packed into lower bits */
00040     closure_t*     closure; /* read closure (for read events) */
00041     timestamp_t*      time; /* write time (for write events) */
00042     void*             uptr; /* for convenience */
00043   } u;
00044 };
00045 
00046 struct modref_s {
00047   void* value; /* "initial" write value */
00048   union {
00049     /* tag: packed into lower bits */
00050     modref_tag_t tag;    
00051     /* events: doubly-linked events
00052        --- order is monotonic wrt timeline. */
00053     modref_event_t* events; 
00054   } u;
00055 };
00056 
00057 #endif
